transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello ji, good afternoon sir. Shri Gatik sir kaise ho aap?
Customer: Good afternoon.
Executive: Anvesha baat kar rahi hu sir IndiaMART se aapke account manager.
Customer: Ha Anvesha boliye.
Executive: Anvesha from services.
Customer: Services kaise chal rahi hai Shri Gatik? Maine aapki baat Rohit se hui hai ya nahi aap mujhe ye bataye.
Executive: Sir Rohit se to nahi hui hai. Rohit sir se nahi baat ho payi thi. Maine aapko aapne bola tha ki decision maker to vahi hai right? Usne bhi mujhe call karna tha. Rohit sir se meri discussion kyu nahi ho pa rahi hai sir?
Customer: Achha ek kaam kijiye rukiye mai ek baar conference kar leta hu. Achha agar nahi ho payegi na to 5 tarikh ke baad hi ho payegi.
Executive: Sir dekho maine aapko
Customer: Achha ye kya hai na ki mai
Executive: Ha mai out station hu aur 5 tarikh ko Rohit ke ghar function hai, thik hai? Isliye vo shayad baat nahi kar pa raha.
Executive: Ho sakta hai sir vo bahut busy ho hai na sir isliye nahi call receive kar rahe honge.
Customer: Thik hai sir aisa agar hai to mai ek baar conference se baat aap logo ka karva deta hu. To aap bhi aap call kare IndiaMART ke help ke number se, thik hai?
Executive: Sir IndiaMART ke number se nahi call kar rahi hu. Mai apne personal number se nahi actually jo IndiaMART help number aata hai na ye mera DID number se aata hai, thik hai? Kyuki yaha pe aapka ek concern open ho rakha hai.
Customer: Achha aap ek minute hold kijiye mai lagata hu mai conference karta hu.
(silence)
Automated Voice: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold pe rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.
Automated Voice: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold pe rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.
Automated Voice: The person you are speaking with has put your
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello ji mam.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello ha ji mam.
Executive: Sir jo aapne conference me liya hai kya?
Customer: Ha mam actually shadi wadi tha.
Customer: Mai thoda bahar me hu.
Executive: Okay sir. Achha koi issue nahi. Sir maine aapko do chizo ke liye call kiya hai.
Customer: Ji aap boliye na.
Executive: Hello ha pehli baat to ye sir ki hamara pehle discussion chal raha tha plan ko upgrade karne ke liye, thik hai? Abhi kuch banana na chalana ye aapke sir I just start ke liye meri aapse baat hui na start service ke regarding. Sir ki sir se baat hui thi. Unhone bola ki jo bhi decisions vagerah honge sabse jo bhi feedback lenge vo Rohit sir lenge. Sir service ke liye mujhko bhi proper tarike se baat aapse ho hi nahi paayi hai ki aap satisfied ho ya nahi ho sir service ko leke. Starting me baat hui thi to us time pe aapne bola tha ki aapko koi problem nahi aa rahi hai right? Baki hamara discussion chal raha tha sir products promote karne ke liye particular list locations me jaha pe ki humne sabse jyada buyleads ke andar shift karke rakhi hai, thik hai?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Start service ke liye baat hui thi meri I just started. Usme hum aapke particular minimum jo start hote the vo do categories ko hum apne promote kar rahe the. Vo categories me hum aapko bata de rahe. Ek category me sir hamare electric bikes batteries ki, thik hai? And second jo thi sir vo thi I think lithium ion battery. Ye aap apne according dekh sakte ho ki kis category me karana hoga. Kyuki ye jo offer chal raha tha na sir abhi tak jo service chal rahi thi vo I just start 10 ki chal rahi thi. Ye kal se band ho jayegi I just start 10. Iski jagah pe ek naya product launch hua hai sir I just start pro karke, thik hai? To abhi jo hum aapko buyleads offer kar rahe the sir vo 72 buyleads offer kar rahe the star wale service me aur is wale service me jo hum aapko offer karenge usko 40% kam buyleads offer karenge sir pro wale service me. Plus sir dekho pro wale service me kuch advance features bhi add on hai to hmm. To pricing jo aa rahi thi aapko vo around do categories ki hum bata deti hu mai aapko kon kon si categories humne de rakhi thi. Hmm ha jo humne sir generally jo pricing ja rahi thi vo around 1 20 days ke around ja rahi thi. Do categories ka vo category wise depend karta hai right? Abhi jo next month se kya hoga sir ye jo pricing hai vo leke aapko 36000 ki jayegi. Usme koi bhi discount nahi jayega, hai na? To agar aapko karana hoga.
Customer: Oye. Mam mai abhi mai ha discuss nahi kar paunga mai bahar me hu shadi ghar me. Ha mai to mai next month hi dikhaunga.
Executive: Koi baat nahi hai. Aap ek kaam karo mai aapke kuch cheeze aapke concern open hai yaha pe. Pehli baat to number aapka verify hona chahiye, thik hai? Aapka mobile number verify hai sir IndiaMART pe?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: GST aap mujhe ek baar apna de do. Aadhar aur PAN card ka de do. GST owner ka pura vo aap mujhe de do sir. PAN card ka PAN card slip bhej do. Ye kuch cheeze aap mujhe bhej do kyuki ye aapka pehle se buyer supplier conflict ki ek ticket open hui hai jo ki 31st October ko open hui thi, thik hai? To iske liye bhi mai aapko call kar rahi thi.
Customer: Renewal to hamara February me aata hai na, abhi kyu?
Executive: Sir renewal ki baat nahi hai. Renewal pehle hi February me aata hai. Ye listing baat kar rahi hu mai sir aapse. Listing services hai sir.
Executive: Aapko jab karana hoga kara lena mai uske liye nahi bol rahi hu. But ye jo cheeze mai aapse bol rahi hu ki aap ye bhej do kyuki aapki jo
Customer: Kya kya bola aapne PAN card, Aadhar card aur?
Executive: Mai aapko bata deti hu kya kya chahiye sir, thik hai? Aapka pehli baat ye jo phone number hai vo verify hona chahiye.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Second thing aapki email verify honi chahiye. Third number GST aap mujhe apna bhej do, thik hai?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: GST should be verified. GST aapka verified hona chahiye. Aadhar aur PAN card me GST ka owner jo hai vo same hona chahiye sir, thik hai? PAN card slip ki aap mujhe photo bhej do. Address proof bhej do usme aap mujhe electricity, water bill ya fir rent agreement kuch bhi aap mujhe bhej do. GST certificate bhej do sir. Photo video bhej do apne office ki jo bhi photos or videos wale hote hai. Aur uske agar aapke paas ho to thik hai nahi ho to koi baat nahi sir. Kyuki iske according se yaha se aapka jo business conflict ki mujhe ticket open hui thi uske baare me aapke against me complaint kiya tha right? Kuch reason solve bhi ho gayi thi baad me, hai na? But aapka ye concern abhi tak close nahi hua hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm. Solve jab hoga tabhi solve hoga.
Executive: Ha to isliye mai aapki ye saari details mang rahi hu na sir jab tak close nahi hogi otherwise aap usme chale jaoge defaulter issue me buyer supplier conflict defaulter me chale jaoge. Vaha se aapki service deboost hone start ho jayegi. Main reason ye tha mera connect karne ka.
Customer: To aapko kya chahiye isko cancel karne ke liye matlab hatane ke liye? Itna sara cheez chahiye GST number ho gaya.
Executive: Ha vo mai aapko bhej deti hu. Screenshot share kar deti hu aap is tarike se apne WhatsApp pe bhej ke aap mujhe share kar do mai aapko concern yaha se close kar sakti hu sir.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai? Baki aap ek kaam ab jab aap free ho na tab hum aapko connect karenge koi dikkat nahi hai sir, thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Aapko mai tab connect kar lu next month me tab aap free ho jaoge.
Customer: 6 7 tarikh tak kar mam 6 7 tarikh ko.
Executive: 7 tarikh ko koi dikkat nahi hai sir mai aapko aaj 7 tak nahi ho payega 7 ke baad hi ho payega pehle nahi.
Customer: 7 ke baad thik hai 7 ke baad kar lenge.
Executive: Koi baat nahi sir jab bhi free ho na tab aap bata dena, thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Thank you so much sir. Nice to talk to you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to upgrade the plan.

- Customer's buyer supplier conflict ticket is open.

- Customer wants to know required documents for verification.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about new I just start pro plan.

- Executive asked for documents to close conflict ticket.

- Executive shared the list of documents on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect next month when customer is free.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- plan upgrade, documents, verification, conflict ticket
